title: How will colleges consider GPA after the COVID-19 pandemic? - Quora
tags: Grade Point Average and University Admissions

response.answer_text: Each high school will make their own policy regarding grading. Some may do Pass/Fail, other are awarding the grade earned before the self-quarantine. Each college will have its own response to the grades on a transcript. Most likely for seniors graduating this year, the grades from the mid-year report will be accepted as final. The transcripts for the class of 2021 will be evaluated based on the college’s decision making process and the transcript the high school sends.

A2A. I’ll take a ‘’WAG’’ (Wild A$$ Guess) and assume one of two opinions. First use the average prior to the pandemic or do,a revaluation following the pandemic and testing as required to determine their GPA. Just a thought. Sp
